nodes.text: Stridan was a major within the military branch of the First Order, a political and military faction formed from the remnants of the Galactic Empire. The major served as a pilot and at one point flew an Upsilon-class command shuttle. They were known as a stentorian commander.
Stridan was first mentioned on a card in the Upsilon-class Shuttle Expansion Pack released by Fantasy Flight Games for their Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game on February 2, 2017.
